public class Login_Controller extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class is used as a controller for the login page

  • Method Details

    • loginButton

      public void loginButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      The loginButton method compares user entered data to the data in the database. The loginButton method checks for user credentials and logs login attempt to login_activity.txt.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
      Throws:
      IOException

    • initialize

      public void initialize(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      The initialize method checks for default language. Lambda expression allows enter key to be pressed.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Goes to next page.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      The initialize method checks for default language. If default language is set to french the login page and all error messages will be displayed in French.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url -
      resourceBundle -
